晈字的基本解释

晈
jiǎo
古同“皎”。

晈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎo］
［《廣韻》古了切，上篠，見。］
(1)明亮。参见“晈晈”。
(2)明白。参见“晈察”。

晈字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　晈； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页494第30
【廣韻】古了切【集韻】吉了切，?音繳。皎，或作晈。言月之白也。【楚辭·九歌】夜晈晈兮旣明。【補註】晈字从日，與皎同。　又【集韻】【類篇】?吉弔切，音叫。義同。

晈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
晈字的起名意思

暂无。

Ancient Tong "Jiao".
晈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎo］
["Guang Yun" is old and cut, Shang Xiao, see you. ]
(1) Bright. See "Xianxiu".
(2) Understand. See "Chancha".
晈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　晈; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 494 30
[Guang Yun] Ancient Rhyme [Ji Yun] Auspicious cut,? Yin pay. Jiao, or Zuo Xun. Yanyue is also white. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Songs] Ye Xiu Xiu Ming Ming. [Supplementary Note] The word "Xi" is from the sun, and is the same as Jiao.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Ji Diao cut, sound called. The same meaning.
